alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University, or near Temple Terrace. The storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Lutz, Egypt Lake-Leto, Pebble Creek, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, University, Greater Northdale, East Lake-Orient Park, West Park, Busch Gardens, Raymond James Stadium, Ybor City, Florida State Fairgrounds, Carrollwood, New Tampa, Tampa Executive Airport, University Of South Florida, and Lettuce Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
